TextBody:
Hello Elena,

Thank you for reaching out!

Have you tried to login in a different browser and to redo the steps to change the password? 

Could you please let us know your availability for tomorrow, so we can schedule a short remote session? 

Looking forward for your response.

Best regards,
__________________
Daniel Anton | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | MDM | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
www.netwrix.com

TextBody:
Hello Elena,

We have arranged the meeting for tomorrow at 11:00, as during the remote we will need access to SSH, we would like to ask you to have prepared prior to our session, a snapshot of your Endpoint Protector appliance from the virtualisation environment (VMWare, HyperV, AWS,Azure, GoogleCloud).
This would represent a double safety measure and also a quick way we can revert to the initial settings in the case where any modifications inadvertently affect the server or environment.

Without having a snapshot prepared and confirmed in written, we will not proceed further with troubleshooting the backend.

Also, for better control during the remote session, we will please ask you to have the following apps installed:

-Putty

-Zoom
Have a nice day ahead!

Best regards,
__________________
Daniel Anton | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | MDM | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
www.netwrix.com



This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.

On Thu, Mar 20, 2025 at 10:44?AM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hello Elena,

We have arranged the meeting for tomorrow at 11:00, as during the remote we will need access to SSH, we would like to ask you to have prepared prior to our session, a snapshot of your Endpoint Protector appliance from the virtualisation environment (VMWare, HyperV, AWS,Azure, GoogleCloud).
This would represent a double safety measure and also a quick way we can revert to the initial settings in the case where any modifications inadvertently affect the server or environment.

Without having a snapshot prepared and confirmed in written, we will not proceed further with troubleshooting the backend.

Also, for better control during the remote session, we will please ask you to have the following apps installed:

-Putty

-Zoom
Have a nice day ahead!
